intro.title: Home
intro.subTitle: Escape to modern seaside luxury with our stunning entire house rental

informations.title: Informations
informations.subTitle: Our beautiful accommodation offers a relaxing and unforgettable getaway by the sea, just steps away from the pristine shores of a blue-flagged beach. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and tranquility just steps away from the glistening Mediterranean waters. Our thoughtfully curated house welcomes you with a cozy ambiance and ample natural light.

jacuzzi.name: JACUZZI ..??
jacuzzi.desc: YES..! The property has a 5 seater Jacuzzi for a luxurious vacation.

infants.name: Infants
infants.desc: A baby grip, a baby high chair and a baby bath are provided after demand with no extra charge.

master.name: Master Bedroom
master.desc: The first bedroom is furnished with a comfortable double bed. The mattresses are orthopedic with independent springs and memory foam, and the sheets and the towels are 100% cotton.

second.name: Second Bedroom
second.desc: The second bedroom features two single beds that can be combined into a double bed. The mattresses are orthopedic with independent springs and memory foam, and the sheets and the towels are 100% cotton.

bathroom.name: Bathroom
bathroom.desc: The accommodation features a modern bathroom equipped with a hydro-massage column, ensuring a luxurious bathing experience. Also has a washing machine.

living.name: Living Room
living.desc: After a day of exploration, relax in the comfortable living room, designed with care to create a warm and inviting atmosphere for your rest. The sofa features an extra bed for a fifth person.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.desc: Our fully equipped kitchen features modern appliances and has everything you need to prepare delicious meals. Whether you're a cooking enthusiast or simply prefer homemade dishes during your stay, the kitchen caters to all your needs.

garden.name: Garden
garden.desc: In the garden there is a barbeque, an outdoor dining table and sofa.

cooling.name: Cooling & Heating
cooling.desc: Air conditioning in all rooms and abundant hot water provided by a solar water heater.

parking.name: Parking lot
parking.desc: Single space parking lot with roof. There are also available several public parking spaces besides the street.

desk.name: Desk
desk.desc: For any work or study needs.

shutters.name: Curtains & Shutters
shutters.desc: To ensure a serene atmosphere, the accommodation features blackout curtains and electric shutters.

infants.name: Infants
infants.desc: A baby grip, a baby high chair and a baby bath are provided after demand with no extra charge.

reservations.title: Reservation
reservations.subTitle: Our accommodation is available for rent all year round. You can book your stay by contacting us via phone, email or using any of the platforms below.
